activities:
Via a shared intranet with the UK office, it is possible to view customer details held by Abcam Ltd, the UK company.  Please note that these details are not used by Abcam Inc., just that it is possible to view the details.  The customer personal data consists of only name, address, telephone, email and fax.
It is also possible for Abcam Inc. to view personal data for members of staff in the Abcam UK office.  These details are limited to name, telephone and email.
privacyprograms: Abcam Ltd is registered as a Data Controller with the Information Commissioner's Office - registration number: Z8516765
recoursemech: Abcam Inc. hereby makes a commitment to cooperate with data protection authorities located in the European Union or their authorized representatives to investigate unresolved complaints.
